divs: sighting detailsi was home with my children in the swimming pool, they sighted the object and they called me to see. i tried to relate the object to something that already knew or he\she had seen, but i didn't get, therefore it was different from everything that had already seen. this object stayed in the air during approximately 2 hours, being moved slowly, and it only disappeared as it disappeared in the horizon. being moved in straight line in the southwest sense for northeast the appearance was of a paper leaf in the bass part, and of a small sphere in the superior part. i decided to send the picture, because i read a matter in the site www.ig.com.br where has a picture of something very similar in http:\\igeducacao.ig.com.br\externo.html?url=http:\\area51.blig.ig.com.br matter: ufo photographed yesterday in rio de janeiro
trends: There have been no other sightings in Pindamonhangaba
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: OVNI na cidade de PIndamonhangaba, Sao Paulo, Brasil
